name: The Spy Who Failed Me
description:
The government's top spies have all been captured by the enemy. As their last resort, they send you to investigate. If only you were smarter...

The Spy Who Failed Me is a grid-based puzzle game about one thing and one thing only: saving your comrades getting caught by the enemy!

In each level, you must find a way to get captured by the enemy by placing bombs, activating switches, and even teleporting around the place, as efficiently as possible!

Is this a good idea? Probably not, but he's doing it anyway!

It's The Spy Who Failed Me!

Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Place bomb

Credits:

Programming, Music, Design - IcyPenguin_ (of Palette Swapper "fame")

Art, Design - Steve the Bartender (of Milk Quest "fame")

Made in 7 hours in GameMaker Studio 2 for the 123rd Tri-Jam.
